answers.author: Peter Dunn
answers.text:
Hi Eileen,
ICMA has employment contract examples for city managers, but not for fire chiefs. You might try contacting the International Association of Fire Chiefs; their website is iafc.org.


Hi Eileen,
ICMA has employment contract examples for city managers, but not for fire chiefs. You might try contacting the International Association of Fire Chiefs; their website is iafc.org.

author: Eileen Swiers
text:
Our local fire chief says the template for his employment contract came from your organization.  He is the Cief in a special district.  I would like to obtain a copy of the employment contract templates you make available.  Where can I locate the templates?
Thank you.
Eileen Swiers
(520) 508-0494
title: Ms.
